sentence: RYAN M. KELLY/AFP via Getty Images He encouraged attendees to contribute to humanitarian efforts in and around Ukraine, while praising Zelenskyy, whose refusal to surrender to Russia has won bipartisan admiration, with the exception of Republican North Carolina Congressman Madison Cawthorn, who previously called Zelenskyy "corrupt" and a "thug."
author: Aaron Navarro
title: Pence decries cancel culture amid protests and praises Zelenskyy at University of Virginia
